t: (PDF) Lipoic Acid Mineral Complex (PolyMVA) Monograph | Paul Anderson - Academia.edu
s: January 16, 2016 - Lipoic Acid Mineral Complex (LAMC also known as "PolyMVA") is a redox molecule that facilitates energy charge transfer at the cellular level with regards to the cellular transport chain, it can therefore protect and provide energy. Mimics the electron transport chain. Differs from free radical scavengers (e.g. alpha-lipoic acid) since there is no free lipoic acid or palladium. They are irreversibly bound together resulting in a molecule that is both fat and water soluble. LAMC (brand ...
